card.name: Aiko Maki
card.property: Response: After Aiko Maki enters play, shuffle a [[cosmic entity]] card from your hand or discard pile into the encounter deck. “Just know that I love you too.”

card.name: Advance the Ritual
card.property: When Revealed: Choose: Either place 4 threat on Babylon Event, or deal yourself 2 encounter cards. [star] Boost: Choose: Either place 2 threat on Babylon Event, or this card gains [boost][boost]. “Regrets are for the dream. You are awake now. Open your eyes.” -Cubisk Core

card.name: Advance the Ritual
card.property: When Revealed: Choose: Either place 4 threat on Babylon Event, or deal yourself 2 encounter cards. [star] Boost: Choose: Either place 2 threat on Babylon Event, or this card gains [boost][boost]. “Regrets are for the dream. You are awake now. Open your eyes.” -Cubisk Core

card.name: Avatar of Magic
card.property: When paying for an [[artifact]], [[cosmic entity]] or [[spell]], generate this card’s printed resource from your discard pile by shuffling it into your deck.

card.name: Avatar of Magic
card.property: When paying for an [[artifact]], [[cosmic entity]] or [[spell]], generate this card’s printed resource from your discard pile by shuffling it into your deck.

card.name: Babylon Event
card.property: “That spell... Did I hear it incorrectly, or was that the beginning of an elder pantheon breach?” -Jericho Drumm Permanent. Forced Response: After threat is placed here, if there is at least 10 threat here, each player takes damage equal to half their printed hit points.

card.name: Invoke a Favor
card.property: Hero Action: Search the encounter deck for a [[cosmic entity]] and reveal it → choose: • Deal 7 damage to an enemy. • Remove 5 threat from a scheme. “All I know is that you’ve made a mortal enemy.” -Wyn

card.name: Invoke a Favor
card.property: Hero Action: Search the encounter deck for a [[cosmic entity]] and reveal it → choose: • Deal 7 damage to an enemy. • Remove 5 threat from a scheme. “All I know is that you’ve made a mortal enemy.” -Wyn

card.name: Invoke a Favor
card.property: Hero Action: Search the encounter deck for a [[cosmic entity]] and reveal it → choose: • Deal 7 damage to an enemy. • Remove 5 threat from a scheme. “All I know is that you’ve made a mortal enemy.” -Wyn

card.name: Cosmic Audience
card.property: Player under any player’s control. Max 1 per player. Response: After you reveal a [[cosmic entity]] card, exhaust this card → draw 1 card.

card.name: Cosmic Bargainer
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Choose a player → that player searches their deck and discard pile for an [[artifact]] or a [[cosmic entity]] card and adds it to their hand. “I bet we can trade this in for something good.” -Ser Reddwyn

card.name: Cosmic Intervention
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When a card is revealed from the encounter deck, search the encounter deck for a [[cosmic entity]] card and reveal it → cancel all of the card’s effects and discard it.

card.name: Cubisk Core
card.property: [star] Cubisk Core gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for each [[cosmic entity]] in the removed- from-game area. (Ser Reddwyn’s nemesis minion.) [star] Boost: This card gains [boost] for each [[cosmic entity]] in the removed-from-game area. “I am here to destroy the dream and wake you from your slumber...”

card.name: Dimitri Krakov
card.property: Interrupt: When you play a [[cosmic entity]], exhaust Dimitri Krakov → instead of shuffling it into the encounter deck, choose to either place it at the top or the bottom. “Calculating the odds that this is a good idea...”

card.name: Finale
card.property: When Revealed: Each character you control takes 2 damage. For each character defeated this way, place 2 threat on Babylon Event. [star] Boost: Choose: Either place 3 threat on Babylon Event, or this card gains [boost][boost][boost]. “Regrets are for the dream. You are awake now. Open your eyes.” -Cubisk Core

card.name: Ser Reddwyn
card.property: Cosmic Commune — Interrupt: When a [[cosmic entity]] is drawn as a boost card, deal it to any player as an encounter card. (Limit once per phase.) “You’ve had the sugar, now here’s the salt.”

alternate.name: Wyn
alternate.property: Avatar of Magic — You may include [[cosmic entity ]]and [[spell ]]cards in your deck from aspects other than your chosen aspect. Action: Shuffle X [[cosmic entity ]]cards from your removed-from-game area into your deck → draw X cards.

card.name: Immortality
card.property: Response: After your deck resets, exhaust Immortality → heal 3 damage from your identity card. “No, I’m old. You’re just tired.” -Ser Reddwyn

card.name: Lady Death
card.property: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking). When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to ALL characters. Remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

card.name: Oblivion
card.property: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking). When Revealed: Stun the villain and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

card.name: Preordained
card.property: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking). When Revealed: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card discarded this way to your hand. Remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

card.name: Sharpened Soul
card.property: Ser Reddwyn gets +2 ATK. Forced Interrupt: At the start of your turn, place this card on top of your deck. “It’s about manifesting an object of power that’s a reflection of who you are.” -Ser Reddwyn

card.name: The Buchcub
card.property: Attach to an non-[[elite]] minion. Attached minion cannot activate. Treat its printed text box as if it were blank. “The longer you read it, the more it eats your mind.” -Ser Reddwyn

card.name: The Contemplator
card.property: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking). When Revealed: Give your identity a tough status card and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

card.name: The Possesor
card.property: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking). When Revealed: Confuse the villain and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

card.name: The-Natural-Order
card.property: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking). When Revealed: Search your deck and discard pile for an upgrade, add it to your hand and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

card.name: The-Powers-That-Be
card.property: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking). When Revealed: Search your deck and discard pile for a resource, add it to your hand and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

card.name: Wyn’s Bracelet
card.property: Action: Exhaust Wyn’s Bracelet → discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 [[cosmic entity ]]or [[spell ]]card discarded this way to your hand.

card.name: Avatar’s Duty
card.property: You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: Exhaust Wyn → remove Avatar’s Duty from the game. Place each [[cosmic entity ]]card from your removed-from-game area into your discard pile. This card gains surge.
